alert.note: Alert for Essex; Morris; Passaic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 6:38AM EST until further notice by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New Jersey... Passaic River At Pine Brook affecting Essex, Morris, and Passaic Counties. For the Passaic River...including Pine Brook...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Passaic River at Pine Brook. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Widespread flooding in Fairfield, including Bloomfield Avenue. Residences between Route 80 and Route 46 flood. Route 46 East in Wayne is shut down. Commercial properties on Bloomfield Avenue in West Caldwell are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 AM EST Monday the stage was 18.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning and continue rising to 20.9 feet tomorrow morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 20.9 feet on 06/01/1984. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Stream Fld Observed Fcsts (7 am) Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Stg Time Date Passaic River Pine Brook 19.0 18.4 Mon 6 am 20.9 20.9 20.9 7am 12/19 &&
info.instruction: Turn around...don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/phi. The next statement will be issued this evening at 645 PM EST.
